QuestData.Title: A Rogue's End
QuestData.Description:
A rogue from the lost expedition, Coulston Nereus, tried scouting the island for any threats after they made landfall.
The last time Henry saw him, he was headed for a cave not far from here.
Can you make contact with Coulston? He may be able to help with our rescue mission.
Oh, and be careful when heading north. Alaria spotted a vicious bear roaming the area.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Stealth to sneak around and find the first expedition's rogue.
